I Need a Schedule Gem Supporting tagline

So, this is what I need - Well, this is what I wanted before I started out thinking I should build a Schedule gem:

The problem is, I really haven’t found any schedule gems that I like.

What I want, is to be able to create a schedule, in a manner very similar to the API shown on the ice_cube gem - but with more than just an API, as I want something that’s easy to show on a Rails (or Formtastic) form. So, why not build a new one… That’s where I’m at right now. I’ll let you know where it goes.
